Title: Relates to the tipping and hourly wages of food service workers and back-of-the-house employees
Summary: Permits tip sharing and tip pooling; requires any restaurant or hospitality business that chooses to permit tip sharing and tip pooling to inform their employees of such policy through a conspicuously posted notice or other effective means of disclosure with as much advance notice as possible; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง651, add ยง652-a, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the tipping and hourly wages of food service workers and back-of-the-house employees
